name_ar: باب كَيْفَ كَانَ بَدْءُ الْوَحْىِ إِلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
name_en: How the Divine Revelation started being revealed to Allah's Messenger

name_ar: باب
باب
باب
باب
باب
بَابُ الإِيمَانِ وَقَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: «بُنِيَ الإِسْلاَمُ عَلَى خَمْسٍ»
name_en: The statement of the Prophet (ﷺ) "Islam is based on five principles

name_ar: باب دُعَاؤُكُمْ إِيمَانُكُمْ
name_en: Your invocation means your faith

name_ar: باب أُمُورِ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: (What is said) regarding the deeds of faith

name_ar: باب الْمُسْلِمُ مَنْ سَلِمَ الْمُسْلِمُونَ مِنْ لِسَانِهِ وَيَدِهِ
name_en: A Muslim is the one who avoids harming Muslims with his tongue and hands

name_ar: باب أَىُّ الإِسْلاَمِ أَفْضَلُ
name_en: Whose Islam is the best (Who is the best Muslim)?

name_ar: باب إِطْعَامُ الطَّعَامِ مِنَ الإِسْلاَمِ
name_en: To feed (others) is a part of Islam

name_ar: باب مِنَ الإِيمَانِ أَنْ يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ
name_en: To like for one's (Muslim's) brother what one likes for himself is a part of faith

name_ar: باب حُبُّ الرَّسُولِ صلى الله عليه وسلم مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: To love the Messenger (Muhammad ﷺ) is a part of faith

name_ar: باب حَلاَوَةِ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: Sweetness (delight) of faith

name_ar: باب عَلاَمَةُ الإِيمَانِ حُبُّ الأَنْصَارِ
name_en: To love the Ansar is a sign of faith

name_ar: باب
باب مِنَ الدِّينِ الْفِرَارُ مِنَ الْفِتَنِ
name_en: To flee (run away) from Al-Fitn (afflictions and trials), is a part of religion

name_ar: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏«أَنَا أَعْلَمُكُمْ بِاللَّهِ»
name_en: The statement of the Prophet (ﷺ): "I know Allah Ta'ala better, than all of you do."

name_ar: باب مَنْ كَرِهَ أَنْ يَعُودَ فِي الْكُفْرِ كَمَا يَكْرَهُ أَنْ يُلْقَى فِي النَّارِ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: Whoever hates to revert to Kufr

name_ar: باب تَفَاضُلِ أَهْلِ الإِيمَانِ فِي الأَعْمَالِ
name_en: The grades in superiority of the believers will be according to their good deeds

name_ar: باب الْحَيَاءُ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: Al-Haya (self-respect, modesty bashfulness, honour etc.) is a part of faith

name_ar: بَابُ: {فَإِنْ تَابُوا وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلاَةَ وَآتَوُا الزَّكَاةَ فَخَلُّوا سَبِيلَهُمْ}
name_en: (The Statement of Allah Jalla Jalalahu) "But if they repent [by rejecting Shirk (polytheism) and accept Islamic Monotheism] and perform As-Salat (Iqamat-as-Salat) and give Zakat then leave their way free."

name_ar: باب مَنْ قَالَ إِنَّ الإِيمَانَ هُوَ الْعَمَلُ
name_en: Whoever says that faith is action (good deeds)

name_ar: بَابُ إِذَا لَمْ يَكُنِ الإِسْلاَمُ عَلَى الْحَقِيقَةِ وَكَانَ عَلَى الاِسْتِسْلاَمِ أَوِ الْخَوْفِ مِنَ الْقَتْلِ
name_en: If one does not embrace Islam truly but does so by compulsion or for fear of being killed (then that man is not a believer)

name_ar: باب إِفْشَاءُ السَّلاَمِ مِنَ الإِسْلاَمِ
name_en: To greet is a part of Islam

name_ar: باب كُفْرَانِ الْعَشِيرِ وَكُفْرٍ دُونَ كُفْرٍ
name_en: To be ungrateful to one's husband. And disbelief is of (different grades) lesser (or greater) degrees.

name_ar: باب الْمَعَاصِي مِنْ أَمْرِ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ
name_en: Sins are from ignorance and a sinner is not a disbeliever unless he worships others along with Allah 'Azza wa Jall

name_ar: بَابُ: {وَإِنْ طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا} فَسَمَّاهُمُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
name_en: And if two parties (or groups) from among the believers fall to fighting, then make peace between them both…" Allah has called them "believers

name_ar: باب ظُلْمٌ دُونَ ظُلْمٍ
name_en: Dhulm (wrong) of one kind can be greater or lesser than that of another

name_ar: باب عَلاَمَةِ الْمُنَافِقِ
name_en: The signs of a hypocrite

name_ar: باب قِيَامُ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: To establish the (Nawafil - voluntary) prayers on the night of Qadr is a part of faith

name_ar: باب الْجِهَادُ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: Al-Jihad (fighting in Allah's Cause) is a part of faith

name_ar: باب تَطَوُّعُ قِيَامِ رَمَضَانَ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: It is a part of faith to establish the (Nawafil — voluntary) prayers during the nights of Ramadan

name_ar: باب صَوْمُ رَمَضَانَ احْتِسَابًا مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: To observe fasting (according to Islamic teachings)] during the month of Ramadan (sincerely and faithfully) hoping for Allah's Reward only, is a part of faith

name_ar: باب الدِّينُ يُسْرٌ
name_en: Religion is very easy

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةُ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: The (offering of) Salat (prayers) is a part of faith

name_ar: باب حُسْنِ إِسْلاَمِ الْمَرْءِ
name_en: (What is said regarding the superiority of) a person who embraces Islam sincerely.

name_ar: باب أَحَبُّ الدِّينِ إِلَى اللَّهِ أَدْوَمُهُ
name_en: Ad-Din (good, righteous deed - act of worship) loved most by Allah Jalla Jalalahu is that which is done regularly. (And in fact the best religion with Allah is Islam)

name_ar: باب زِيَادَةِ الإِيمَانِ وَنُقْصَانِهِ
name_en: Faith increases and decreases

name_ar: باب الزَّكَاةُ مِنَ الإِسْلاَمِ
name_en: To pay Zakat is a part of Islam

name_ar: باب اتِّبَاعُ الْجَنَائِزِ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: To accompany the funeral processions (up to the place of burial) is a part of faith

name_ar: باب خَوْفِ الْمُؤْمِنِ مِنْ أَنْ يَحْبَطَ عَمَلُهُ وَهُوَ لاَ يَشْعُرُ
name_en: (What is said regarding) the fear of a believer that his good deeds may be annulled (lost) without his knowledge

name_ar: بَابُ سُؤَالِ جِبْرِيلَ النَّبِيَّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ عَنِ الإِيمَانِ وَالإِسْلاَمِ وَالإِحْسَانِ وَعِلْمِ السَّاعَةِ
name_en: The asking of (angel) Jibril (Gabriel) from the Prophet (ﷺ) about Iman, Islam, Ihsan and the knowledge of the Hour

name_ar: باب
باب فَضْلِ مَنِ اسْتَبْرَأَ لِدِينِهِ
name_en: The superiority of that person who leaves all doubtful (unclear) things for the sake of his religion

name_ar: باب أَدَاءُ الْخُمُسِ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
name_en: To pay Al-Khumus (one-fifth of the war booty to be given in Allah's Cause) is a part of faith

name_ar: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الأَعْمَالَ بِالنِّيَّةِ وَالْحِسْبَةِ وَلِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى
name_en: What is said regarding the statement: "The reward of deeds depends upon the intention and hoping to get rewards from Allah."

name_ar: بَابُ قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: «الدِّينُ النَّصِيحَةُ لِلَّهِ وَلِرَسُولِهِ وَلأَئِمَّةِ الْمُسْلِمِينَ وَعَامَّتِهِمْ»
name_en: The statement of the Prophet (ﷺ): Religion is An-Nasihah (to be sincere and true) to Allah, to His Messenger (Muhammad (ﷺ)), to the Muslim rulers, and to all the Muslims

name_ar: بَابُ فَضْلِ الْعِلْمِ
name_en: The superiority of knowledge

name_ar: باب مَنْ سُئِلَ عِلْمًا وَهُوَ مُشْتَغِلٌ فِي حَدِيثِهِ فَأَتَمَّ الْحَدِيثَ ثُمَّ أَجَابَ السَّائِلَ
name_en: Whoever is asked about knowledge while he is busy in some conversation, so he finished talking and then answered the questioner

name_ar: باب مَنْ رَفَعَ صَوْتَهُ بِالْعِلْمِ
name_en: Whoever raises his voice in (conveying) knowledge

name_ar: باب قَوْلِ الْمُحَدِّثِ حَدَّثَنَا أَوْ، أَخْبَرَنَا وَأَنْبَأَنَا
name_en: Concerning the variety of words used by narrators conveying different significations regarding the concept of narrating and which has importance for the Hadith scholars only

name_ar: باب طَرْحِ الإِمَامِ الْمَسْأَلَةَ عَلَى أَصْحَابِهِ لِيَخْتَبِرَ مَا عِنْدَهُمْ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ
name_en: The Imam questioning his companions in order to test their knowledge

name_ar: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْعِلْمِ
name_en: What is said about knowledge

name_ar: باب مَا يُذْكَرُ فِي الْمُنَاوَلَةِ وَكِتَابِ أَهْلِ الْعِلْمِ بِالْعِلْمِ إِلَى الْبُلْدَانِ
name_en: What is said regarding the hand to hand exchange (of books of knowledge), and the writing of knowledge by religious scholars to different countries

name_ar: باب مَنْ قَعَدَ حَيْثُ يَنْتَهِي بِهِ الْمَجْلِسُ وَمَنْ رَأَى فُرْجَةً فِي الْحَلْقَةِ فَجَلَسَ فِيهَا‏.‏
name_en: Whoever sat at the farther end of a gathering. And whoever found a place amongst a gathering and took his seat there

name_ar: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏رُبَّ مُبَلَّغٍ أَوْعَى مِنْ سَامِعٍ ‏"‏
name_en: The Statement of the Prophet (ﷺ): lt is probable that a person who receives a piece of information indirectly may comprehend it better than he who has heard it directly from its source

name_ar: بَابُ الْعِلْمُ قَبْلَ الْقَوْلِ وَالْعَمَلِ
name_en: It is essential to know a thing first before saying or acting upon it.

name_ar: باب مَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَتَخَوَّلُهُمْ بِالْمَوْعِظَةِ وَالْعِلْمِ كَىْ لاَ يَنْفِرُوا
name_en: The Prophet (ﷺ) used to take care of the people in preaching by selecting a suitable time so that they might not run away (never made them averse or bored them with religious talk and knowledge all the time)

name_ar: باب مَنْ جَعَلَ لأَهْلِ الْعِلْمِ أَيَّامًا مَعْلُومَةً
name_en: Whoever fixed a special day for giving (a religious talk) to the students

name_ar: باب مَنْ يُرِدِ اللَّهُ بِهِ خَيْرًا يُفَقِّهْهُ فِي الدِّينِ
name_en: If Allah Jalla Jalalahu wants to do good to a person, He makes him comprehend (the religion). [The understanding of the Qur'an and As-Sunna (legal ways) of the Prophet (Muhammad (ﷺ))]

name_ar: باب الْفَهْمِ فِي الْعِلْمِ
name_en: (The superiority of) comprehending knowledge

name_ar: باب الاِغْتِبَاطِ فِي الْعِلْمِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ وَقَالَ عُمَرُ تَفَقَّهُوا قَبْلَ أَنْ تُسَوَّدُوا
name_en: Wish to be like the one who has knowledge and Al-Hikmah [wisdom i.e., the knowledge of the Qur'an and the Sunna (legal ways) of the Prophet (ﷺ)]

name_ar: باب مَا ذُكِرَ فِي ذَهَابِ مُوسَى صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الْبَحْرِ إِلَى الْخَضِرِ
name_en: What has been said about the journey of Prophet Musa ('alaihi as-salam) (when he went) in the sea to meet Al-Khidr

name_ar: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏ اللَّهُمَّ عَلِّمْهُ الْكِتَابَ ‏"‏
name_en: The statement of the Prophet (ﷺ): "O Allah! Bestow on him (Ibn Abbas) the knowledge of the Book (the Qur'an)

name_ar: باب مَتَى يَصِحُّ سَمَاعُ الصَّغِيرِ
name_en: At what age may a youth be listened to (i.e. quotation of the Hadith from a boy be acceptable)

name_ar: باب الْخُرُوجِ فِي طَلَبِ الْعِلْمِ
name_en: To go out in search of knowledge

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ مَنْ عَلِمَ وَعَلَّمَ
name_en: The superiority of a person who learns (Islam, becomes a religious scholar) and then teaches it to others

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الْعِلْمِ وَظُهُورِ الْجَهْلِ
name_en: (What is said regarding) the disappearance of the (religious) knowledge and the appearance of (religious) ignorance

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الْعِلْمِ
name_en: The superiority of (religious) knowledge

name_ar: باب الْفُتْيَا وَهُوَ وَاقِفٌ عَلَى الدَّابَّةِ وَغَيْرِهَا
name_en: To give a religious verdict while riding an animal or standing on anything else

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَجَابَ الْفُتْيَا بِإِشَارَةِ الْيَدِ وَالرَّأْسِ
name_en: Whoever gave a religious verdict by beckoning or by nodding

name_ar: بَابُ تَحْرِيضِ النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ وَفْدَ عَبْدِ الْقَيْسِ عَلَى أَنْ يَحْفَظُوا الإِيمَانَ وَالْعِلْمَ وَيُخْبِرُوا مَنْ وَرَاءَهُمْ
name_en: The Prophet (ﷺ) urged the people (mission) of 'Abdul Qais to memorize the faith and the (religious) knowledge (as he explained to them) and to inform (convey) to their people whom they left behind (at home)

name_ar: باب الرِّحْلَةِ فِي الْمَسْأَلَةِ النَّازِلَةِ وَتَعْلِيمِ أَهْلِهِ
name_en: To travel seeking an answer to a problematic matter, and to teach it to one's family

name_ar: باب التَّنَاوُبِ فِي الْعِلْمِ
name_en: To fix the duties in rotation for learning (religious) knowledge

name_ar: باب الْغَضَبِ فِي الْمَوْعِظَةِ وَالتَّعْلِيمِ إِذَا رَأَى مَا يَكْرَهُ
name_en: To be furious while preaching or teaching if one sees what one hates

name_ar: باب مَنْ بَرَكَ عَلَى رُكْبَتَيْهِ عِنْدَ الإِمَامِ أَوِ الْمُحَدِّثِ
name_en: Whoever knelt down before the Imam or a (religious) preacher

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَعَادَ الْحَدِيثَ ثَلاَثًا لِيُفْهَمَ عَنْهُ
name_en: Repeating ones talk thrice in order to make others understand

name_ar: باب تَعْلِيمِ الرَّجُلِ أَمَتَهُ وَأَهْلَهُ
name_en: A man teaching (religion to) his woman-slave and his family

name_ar: باب عِظَةِ الإِمَامِ النِّسَاءَ وَتَعْلِيمِهِنَّ
name_en: The preaching (and teaching) of the (religious) knowledge to women by the Imam (Chief)

name_ar: باب الْحِرْصِ عَلَى الْحَدِيثِ
name_en: Eagerness to (learn) the Hadith

name_ar: باب كَيْفَ يُقْبَضُ الْعِلْمُ
name_en: How the (religious) knowledge will be taken away

name_ar: باب هَلْ يُجْعَلُ لِلنِّسَاءِ يَوْمٌ عَلَى حِدَةٍ فِي الْعِلْمِ
name_en: Should a day be fixed for women in order to teach them religion (apart from men)?

name_ar: باب مَنْ سَمِعَ شَيْئًا، فَرَاجَعَ حَتَّى يَعْرِفَهُ
name_en: Whoever heard something (but did not understand it) and then asked again till he understood it completely

name_ar: باب لِيُبَلِّغِ الْعِلْمَ الشَّاهِدُ الْغَائِبَ
name_en: It is incumbent on those who are present [in a religious meeting (or conference)] to convey the knowledge to those who are absent

name_ar: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ كَذَبَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
name_en: The sin of a person who tells a lie against the Prophet (ﷺ)

name_ar: باب كِتَابَةِ الْعِلْمِ
name_en: The writing of knowledge

name_ar: باب الْعِلْمِ وَالْعِظَةِ بِاللَّيْلِ
name_en: The knowledge and its teaching and preaching at night

name_ar: باب السَّمَرِ بِالْعِلْمِ
name_en: To speak about (religious) knowledge at night

name_ar: باب حِفْظِ الْعِلْمِ
name_en: (What is said regarding) the memorization of (religious) knowledge

name_ar: باب الإِنْصَاتِ لِلْعُلَمَاءِ
name_en: To be quiet (and listen) to religious learned men

name_ar: باب مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ لِلْعَالِمِ إِذَا سُئِلَ أَىُّ النَّاسِ أَعْلَمُ فَيَكِلُ الْعِلْمَ إِلَى اللَّهِ
name_en: When a religious learned man is asked, "Who is the most learned person." it is better for him to attribute or entrust absolute knowledge to Allah 'Azza wa Jall and to say. "Allah is the Most Learned (than anybody else)"

name_ar: باب مَنْ سَأَلَ وَهْوَ قَائِمٌ عَالِمًا جَالِسًا
name_en: Whosoever, while standing, asked a religious learned man who was sitting (on a pulpit or a similar thing, about something)

name_ar: باب السُّؤَالِ وَالْفُتْيَا عِنْدَ رَمْىِ الْجِمَارِ
name_en: To ask about a religious matter and to give a religious verdict (at Mina during Hajj) while doing the Rami of Jimar (throwing of pebbles at the Jimar in Mina during Hajj)

name_ar: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {وَمَا أُوتِيتُمْ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ إِلاَّ قَلِيلاً}
name_en: The Statement of Allah Ta'ala: "And of knowledge you (mankind) have been given only a little"

name_ar: باب غَسْلِ الْمَذْىِ وَالْوُضُوءِ مِنْهُ
name_en: The washing away of emotional urethral discharge and performing ablution after it

name_ar: باب مَنْ تَطَيَّبَ ثُمَّ اغْتَسَلَ وَبَقِيَ أَثَرُ الطِّيبِ
name_en: Whoever scented himself and then took a bath while the effect of scent remained even after bathing

name_ar: باب تَخْلِيلِ الشَّعَرِ حَتَّى إِذَا ظَنَّ أَنَّهُ قَدْ أَرْوَى بَشَرَتَهُ أَفَاضَ عَلَيْهِ
name_en: To rub the hair thoroughly (while taking a bath) till one feels that one has made his skin wet (underneath the hair) and the one pours water over it

name_ar: بَابُ مَنْ تَوَضَّأَ فِي الْجَنَابَةِ ثُمَّ غَسَلَ سَائِرَ جَسَدِهِ، وَلَمْ يُعِدْ، غَسْلَ مَوَاضِعِ الْوُضُوءِ مَرَّةً أُخْرَى
name_en: Whoever performed the ablution of Janaba and then washed his body but did not wash once again the parts which were washed in ablution

name_ar: باب إِذَا ذَكَرَ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ أَنَّهُ جُنُبٌ يَخْرُجُ كَمَا هُوَ وَلاَ يَتَيَمَّمُ
name_en: If someone while in the mosque remembers that he is Junub, he should leave (the mosque to take a bath) and should not perform Tayammum

name_ar: باب نَفْضِ الْيَدَيْنِ مِنَ الْغُسْلِ عَنِ الْجَنَابَةِ
name_en: The removing of water from one's body with one's hands after taking the bath of Janaba

name_ar: باب مَنْ بَدَأَ بِشِقِّ رَأْسِهِ الأَيْمَنِ فِي الْغُسْلِ
name_en: Starting from the right side of one's head while taking a bath

name_ar: باب مَنِ اغْتَسَلَ عُرْيَانًا وَحْدَهُ فِي الْخَلْوَةِ، وَمَنْ تَسَتَّرَ فَالتَّسَتُّرُ أَفْضَلُ
name_en: Whosoever took a bath alone (in seclusion) completely naked

name_ar: باب التَّسَتُّرِ فِي الْغُسْلِ عِنْدَ النَّاسِ
name_en: To screen oneself from the people while taking a bath

name_ar: باب إِذَا احْتَلَمَتِ الْمَرْأَةُ
name_en: If a woman has a wet dream (nocturnal sexual discharge)

name_ar: باب عَرَقِ الْجُنُبِ وَأَنَّ الْمُسْلِمَ لاَ يَنْجُسُ
name_en: (What is said regarding) the sweat of a Junub. And a Muslim never becomes impure

name_ar: باب الْجُنُبُ يَخْرُجُ وَيَمْشِي فِي السُّوقِ وَغَيْرِهِ
name_en: A Junub person) can go out and walk in the market or anywhere else

name_ar: باب كَيْنُونَةِ الْجُنُبِ فِي الْبَيْتِ إِذَا تَوَضَّأَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَغْتَسِلَ
name_en: A Junub can stay at home without taking a bath but with ablution

name_ar: باب نَوْمِ الْجُنُبِ
name_en: Sleeping of a Junub person

name_ar: باب الْجُنُبِ يَتَوَضَّأُ ثُمَّ يَنَامُ
name_en: A Junub person should perform ablution before sleeping

name_ar: باب إِذَا الْتَقَى الْخِتَانَانِ
name_en: When male and female organs come in close contact (bath becomes compulsory)

name_ar: باب غَسْلِ مَا يُصِيبُ مِنْ فَرْجِ الْمَرْأَةِ
name_en: Washing away what comes out from the private parts of a woman (woman's discharge) if one gets soiled with that

name_ar: باب كَيْفَ كَانَ بَدْءُ الْحَيْضِ
name_en: How the menses started

name_ar: باب الأَمْرِ بِالنُّفَسَاءِ إِذَا نُفِسْنَ
name_en: Menses (a thing) ordained (by Allah and instructions) for women when they get their menses

name_ar: باب غَسْلِ الْحَائِضِ رَأْسَ زَوْجِهَا وَتَرْجِيلِهِ
name_en: The washing of the husband's head and the combing of his hair by a menstruating wife

name_ar: باب قِرَاءَةِ الرَّجُلِ فِي حَجْرِ امْرَأَتِهِ وَهْىَ حَائِضٌ
name_en: To recite the Qur'an while lying in the lap of one's own menstruating wife

name_ar: باب مَنْ سَمَّى النِّفَاسَ حَيْضًا
name_en: Using the word Nifas for menses

name_ar: باب مُبَاشَرَةِ الْحَائِضِ
name_en: Fondling a menstruating wife

name_ar: باب تَرْكِ الْحَائِضِ الصَّوْمَ
name_en: A menstruating women should leave observing Saum (fasting)

name_ar: باب تَقْضِي الْحَائِضُ الْمَنَاسِكَ كُلَّهَا إِلاَّ الطَّوَافَ بِالْبَيْتِ
name_en: A menstruating women should perform all the ceremonies of Hajj except the Tawaf around the Ka'bah

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِحَاضَةِ
name_en: Al-Isthihada [bleeding (from the womb) in between a woman's periods]

name_ar: باب غَسْلِ دَمِ الْمَحِيضِ
name_en: Washing out the menstrual blood

name_ar: باب الاِعْتِكَافِ لِلْمُسْتَحَاضَةِ
name_en: The I'tikaf of a woman who is bleeding in between her periods

name_ar: باب هَلْ تُصَلِّي الْمَرْأَةُ فِي ثَوْبٍ حَاضَتْ فِيهِ
name_en: Can a woman offer her Salat (prayers) in the clothes in which she has her menses?

name_ar: باب الطِّيبِ لِلْمَرْأَةِ عِنْدَ غُسْلِهَا مِنَ الْمَحِيضِ
name_en: Putting perfume by woman at the time of taking a bath after finishing from the menses

name_ar: باب دَلْكِ الْمَرْأَةِ نَفْسَهَا إِذَا تَطَهَّرَتْ مِنَ الْمَحِيضِ وَكَيْفَ تَغْتَسِلُ، وَتَأْخُذُ فِرْصَةً مُمَسَّكَةً فَتَتَّبِعُ بِهَا أَثَرَ الدَّمِ
name_en: A woman should rub her own body thoroughly during a bath after the menses

name_ar: باب غُسْلِ الْمَحِيضِ
name_en: To take a bath after finishing from the menses

name_ar: باب امْتِشَاطِ الْمَرْأَةِ عِنْدَ غُسْلِهَا مِنَ الْمَحِيضِ
name_en: The combing of head-hair while taking the bath after finishing from her menses

name_ar: باب نَقْضِ الْمَرْأَةِ شَعَرَهَا عِنْدَ غُسْلِ الْمَحِيضِ
name_en: A woman should undo her head-hair while taking the bath after finishing from her menses.

name_ar: باب مُخَلَّقَةٍ وَغَيْرِ مُخَلَّقَةٍ
name_en: (A little lump of flesh) some formed and some unformed.

name_ar: باب كَيْفَ تُهِلُّ الْحَائِضُ بِالْحَجِّ وَالْعُمْرَةِ
name_en: How a menstruating woman should assume Ihram for Hajj or for Umrah

name_ar: باب إِقْبَالِ الْمَحِيضِ وَإِدْبَارِهِ
name_en: The beginning and the ending of menstrual periods

name_ar: باب لاَ تَقْضِي الْحَائِضُ الصَّلاَةَ
name_en: There is no Salat (prayer) to be offered by a menstruating woman in lieu of the missed Salat during her menses.

name_ar: باب النَّوْمِ مَعَ الْحَائِضِ وَهْىَ فِي ثِيَابِهَا
name_en: Sleeping with a menstruating woman (one's wife) while she is wearing her clothes (that are worn during menses)

name_ar: باب مَنِ اتَّخَذَ ثِيَابَ الْحَيْضِ سِوَى ثِيَابِ الطُّهْرِ
name_en: Whoever kept a special dress for menses besides other dresses for the clean period

name_ar: باب شُهُودِ الْحَائِضِ الْعِيدَيْنِ، وَدَعْوَةَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ، وَيَعْتَزِلْنَ الْمُصَلَّى
name_en: The participation of menstruating women in the two Eid festivals and in religious gatherings of Muslims and their isolation from the Musalla (prayer place)

name_ar: بَابُ إِذَا حَاضَتْ فِي شَهْرٍ ثَلاَثَ حِيَضٍ وَمَا يُصَدَّقُ النِّسَاءُ فِي الْحَيْضِ وَالْحَمْلِ فِيمَا يُمْكِنُ مِنَ الْحَيْضِ
name_en: If a woman gets menses thrice a month

name_ar: باب الصُّفْرَةِ وَالْكُدْرَةِ فِي غَيْرِ أَيَّامِ الْحَيْضِ
name_en: Yellowish discharge not during the menses

name_ar: باب عِرْقِ الاِسْتِحَاضَةِ
name_en: Al-Istihadah (bleeding in between the periods is from a blood vessel)

name_ar: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَحِيضُ بَعْدَ الإِفَاضَةِ
name_en: If a woman gets her menses after Tawaf-al-Ifada

name_ar: باب إِذَا رَأَتِ الْمُسْتَحَاضَةُ الطُّهْرَ
name_en: When a woman having bleeding in between her periods notices signs of cleanliness from her menses

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النُّفَسَاءِ وَسُنَّتِهَا
name_en: The offering of a funeral prayer for a woman who had died (or after) delivery and its (i.e., funeral prayer's) legal way of performing

name_ar: باب
باب
باب إِذَا لَمْ يَجِدْ مَاءً وَلاَ تُرَابًا
name_en: What to do if neither water nor earth is available

name_ar: باب التَّيَمُّمِ فِي الْحَضَرِ، إِذَا لَمْ يَجِدِ الْمَاءَ، وَخَافَ فَوْتَ الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: The performance of Tayammum by a non-traveller (is permissible) when water is not available and when one is afraid that the time of Salat (prayer) may elapse

name_ar: باب الْمُتَيَمِّمُ هَلْ يَنْفُخُ فِيهِمَا
name_en: Can a person blow off the dust from his hands in performing Tayammum (before passing them over his face)

name_ar: باب التَّيَمُّمُ لِلْوَجْهِ وَالْكَفَّيْنِ
name_en: Tayammum is for the hands and the face

name_ar: باب الصَّعِيدُ الطَّيِّبُ وَضُوءُ الْمُسْلِمِ ، يَكْفِيهِ مِنَ الْمَاءِ
name_en: Clean earth is sufficient for a Muslim as a substitute for water for ablution (if he does not find water)

name_ar: باب إِذَا خَافَ الْجُنُبُ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ الْمَرَضَ أَوِ الْمَوْتَ أَوْ خَافَ الْعَطَشَ، تَيَمَّمَ
name_en: A Junub can perform Tayammum if he is afraid of disease, death or thirst

name_ar: باب التَّيَمُّمُ ضَرْبَةٌ
name_en: Tayammum with one light stroke (on the earth)

name_ar: باب
باب كَيْفَ فُرِضَتِ الصَّلاَةُ فِي الإِسْرَاءِ
name_en: How As-Salat (the Prayer) was prescribed on the night of Al-Isra (miraculous night journey) of the Prophet (ﷺ) to Jerusalem (and then to the heavens)

name_ar: باب وُجُوبِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثِّيَابِ
name_en: It is obligatory to wear clothes while offering As-Salat (the prayers)

name_ar: باب عَقْدِ الإِزَارِ عَلَى الْقَفَا فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: To tie Izar (dress worn below the waist) at one's back while offering Salat (prayers)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثَّوْبِ الْوَاحِدِ مُلْتَحِفًا بِهِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) with a single garment wrapped round the body

name_ar: باب إِذَا صَلَّى فِي الثَّوْبِ الْوَاحِدِ فَلْيَجْعَلْ عَلَى عَاتِقَيْهِ
name_en: If someone offers Salat (prayer) wrapped in a single garment, he should cross its corners round his shoulders

name_ar: باب إِذَا كَانَ الثَّوْبُ ضَيِّقًا
name_en: If the garment is tight (over the body)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْجُبَّةِ الشَّأْمِيَّةِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) in a Syrian cloak (made by infidels)

name_ar: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ التَّعَرِّي فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَغَيْرِهَا
name_en: It is disliked to the naked during As-Salat (the prayers)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْقَمِيصِ وَالسَّرَاوِيلِ وَالتُّبَّانِ وَالْقَبَاءِ
name_en: To offer Salat (prayer) with a shirt, trousers, a Turban or a Qaba (an outer garment with full length sleeves)

name_ar: باب مَا يَسْتُرُ مِنَ الْعَوْرَةِ
name_en: What may be used to cover the private parts of the body

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ بِغَيْرِ رِدَاءٍ
name_en: To pray without a Rida

name_ar: باب مَا يُذْكَرُ فِي الْفَخِذِ
name_en: What is said about the thigh

name_ar: باب فِي كَمْ تُصَلِّي الْمَرْأَةُ فِي الثِّيَابِ
name_en: In how many (what sort of) clothes a woman should offer Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب إِذَا صَلَّى فِي ثَوْبٍ لَهُ أَعْلاَمٌ وَنَظَرَ إِلَى عَلَمِهَا
name_en: If a person offered Salat (prayer) in a dress with marks and looked at those marks during the Salat

name_ar: بَابُ إِنْ صَلَّى فِي ثَوْبٍ مُصَلَّبٍ أَوْ تَصَاوِيرَ هَلْ تَفْسُدُ صَلاَتُهُ وَمَا يُنْهَى عَنْ ذَلِكَ
name_en: If someone offers Salat (prayer) in a garment bearing marks of a cross or picture, will he Salat be annulled? And what is forbidden thereof

name_ar: باب مَنْ صَلَّى فِي فَرُّوجِ حَرِيرٍ ثُمَّ نَزَعَهُ
name_en: Whoever offered Salat (prayer)in a silk Farruj (an outer garment opened at the back) and then took it off.

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثَّوْبِ الأَحْمَرِ
name_en: (It is permissible) to offer Salat (prayer) in a red garment

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي السُّطُوحِ وَالْمِنْبَرِ وَالْخَشَبِ
name_en: (It is permissible) to offer Salat (prayer) on roofs, a pulpit or wood

name_ar: باب إِذَا أَصَابَ ثَوْبُ الْمُصَلِّي امْرَأَتَهُ إِذَا سَجَدَ
name_en: If the clothes of a prayer person in prostration touched his wife [would that make his Salat (prayer) invalid]?

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْحَصِيرِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) on the Hasir (a mat that is made of the leaves of date-palm trees and is as long as or longer than a man's stature

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْخُمْرَةِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) on a Khumra (a small mat, hardly sufficient for the face and hands while prostrating during Salat)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْفِرَاشِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) on the bed

name_ar: باب السُّجُودِ عَلَى الثَّوْبِ فِي شِدَّةِ الْحَرِّ
name_en: To prostrate on a garment in scorching heat

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي النِّعَالِ
name_en: To offer Salat (prayer) with the shoes on

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْخِفَافِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) wearing Khuff (leather socks)

name_ar: باب إِذَا لَمْ يُتِمَّ السُّجُودَ
name_en: If someone does not prostrate properly

name_ar: باب يُبْدِي ضَبْعَيْهِ وَيُجَافِي فِي السُّجُودِ
name_en: During Prostrations one should show his armpits and separate his forearms from his body

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ اسْتِقْبَالِ الْقِبْلَةِ
name_en: Superiority of (praying) facing the Qiblah with the toes toward it as well

name_ar: باب قِبْلَةِ أَهْلِ الْمَدِينَةِ وَأَهْلِ الشَّأْمِ وَالْمَشْرِقِ
name_en: The Qiblah for the people of Al-Madina, Sham and the East.

name_ar: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {وَاتَّخِذُوا مِنْ مَقَامِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ مُصَلًّى}
name_en: The Statement of Allah " And take you (people) the Maqam (place) of Ibrahim (Abraham) (or the stone on which Abraham stood while he was building the Kabah as a place of prayer (for some of your Salat e.g., two Raka after the Tawaf of Kabah)"

name_ar: باب التَّوَجُّهِ نَحْوَ الْقِبْلَةِ حَيْثُ كَانَ
name_en: [During the obligatory Salat (prayers)] one should face the Qiblah (Kabah at Makkah) wherever one may be

name_ar: بَابُ مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِبْلَةِ، وَمَنْ لاَ يَرَى الإِعَادَةَ عَلَى مَنْ سَهَا فَصَلَّى إِلَى غَيْرِ الْقِبْلَةِ
name_en: What has been said about (facing) the Qiblah (Kabah at Makkah) and wherever considered that there was no need to repeat the Salat (prayer) if someone offered prayers by mistake facing a direction other than that of the Qiblah

name_ar: باب حَكِّ الْبُزَاقِ بِالْيَدِ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: To scrape off the sputum from the mosque with the hand (using some tool or other, or using n tool)

name_ar: باب حَكِّ الْمُخَاطِ بِالْحَصَى مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: To scrape the nasal secretion off the mosque with gravel

name_ar: باب لاَ يَبْصُقْ عَنْ يَمِينِهِ، فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: It is forbidden to spit on the right side while in Salat (prayers)

name_ar: باب لِيَبْزُقْ عَنْ يَسَارِهِ، أَوْ تَحْتَ قَدَمِهِ الْيُسْرَى
name_en: One should spit on the left side or under one's left foot

name_ar: باب كَفَّارَةِ الْبُزَاقِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The expiation for spitting in the mosque

name_ar: باب دَفْنِ النُّخَامَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The burying of the expectoration in the mosque

name_ar: باب إِذَا بَدَرَهُ الْبُزَاقُ فَلْيَأْخُذْ بِطَرَفِ ثَوْبِهِ
name_en: If the spit or sputum comes out suddenly then one should spit in the corner of one's garnet

name_ar: باب عِظَةِ الإِمَامِ النَّاسَ فِي إِتْمَامِ الصَّلاَةِ، وَذِكْرِ الْقِبْلَةِ
name_en: Preaching of the Imam to the people regarding the proper offering of As-Salat (the prayers) and the mention of the Qiblah (Kabah at Makkah)

name_ar: باب هَلْ يُقَالُ مَسْجِدُ بَنِي فُلاَنٍ
name_en: It is permissible to say, "Masjid (mosque) of Bani so-and-so?

name_ar: باب الْقِسْمَةِ وَتَعْلِيقِ الْقِنْوِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The distribution (of goods or wealth) and the hanging of a cluster of dates in the mosque.

name_ar: باب مَنْ دَعَا لِطَعَامٍ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ وَمَنْ أَجَابَ فِيهِ
name_en: Receiving an invitation to dinner in the mosque and accepting it

name_ar: باب الْقَضَاءِ وَاللِّعَانِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ بَيْنَ الرِّجَالِ وَالنِّسَاءِ
name_en: To give the judicial verdicts in the mosque and to perform the Al-Lian between men and women (husbands and wives) there

name_ar: باب إِذَا دَخَلَ بَيْتًا يُصَلِّي حَيْثُ شَاءَ، أَوْ حَيْثُ أُمِرَ، وَلاَ يَتَجَسَّسُ
name_en: If someone enters a house, should he offer prayers where he likes, or as he is told? And he should not look out to seek information about the place or do spying

name_ar: باب الْمَسَاجِدِ فِي الْبُيُوتِ
name_en: About (taking) the mosques in the houses

name_ar: باب التَّيَمُّنِ فِي دُخُولِ الْمَسْجِدِ وَغَيْرِهِ
name_en: While entering the mosques etc. one should start with the right foot

name_ar: بَابُ هَلْ تُنْبَشُ قُبُورُ مُشْرِكِي الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ، وَيُتَّخَذُ مَكَانَهَا مَسَاجِدَ
name_en: Is it permissible to dig the graves of pagans of the period of Ignorance, and to use that place as a mosque?

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَرَابِضِ الْغَنَمِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) in a sheep-fold

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَوَاضِعِ الإِبِلِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) in the camel yards (the places where the camels are stationed)

name_ar: باب مَنْ صَلَّى وَقُدَّامَهُ تَنُّورٌ أَوْ نَارٌ أَوْ شَىْءٌ مِمَّا يُعْبَدُ، فَأَرَادَ بِهِ اللَّهَ
name_en: whoever offered Salat (prayer) with furnace or fire or any other worshipable thing in front of him but he intended Salat solely for Allah

name_ar: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْمَقَابِرِ
name_en: The dislikeness of offering As-Salat (the prayers) in grave-yards

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَوَاضِعِ الْخَسْفِ وَالْعَذَابِ
name_en: (What is said about) offering Salat (Prayer) at the places where the earth had sunk down and Allah's punishment had fallen

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْبِيعَةِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) in a church or in a temple etc.

name_ar: باب
باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏ جُعِلَتْ لِيَ الأَرْضُ مَسْجِدًا وَطَهُورًا ‏"‏
name_en: The sayings of the Prophet (ﷺ) "The earth has been made for me a Masjid (place for praying) and a thing to purify (to perform Tayammum)."

name_ar: باب نَوْمِ الْمَرْأَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Sleeping of a woman in the mosque (and residing in it)

name_ar: باب نَوْمِ الرِّجَالِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Sleeping of a men in the mosque

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِذَا قَدِمَ مِنْ سَفَرٍ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) when returning from a journey

name_ar: باب إِذَا دَخَلَ الْمَسْجِدَ فَلْيَرْكَعْ رَكْعَتَيْنِ
name_en: If one entered a mosque, one should offer two Rak'a (Tahayyat-al-Masjid) before sitting

name_ar: باب الْحَدَثِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Al-Hadath (passing wind) in the mosque

name_ar: باب بُنْيَانِ الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The construction of (the prophet's pbuh) mosque

name_ar: باب التَّعَاوُنِ فِي بِنَاءِ الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: To co-operate in building a mosque

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِعَانَةِ بِالنَّجَّارِ وَالصُّنَّاعِ فِي أَعْوَادِ الْمِنْبَرِ وَالْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Employing the carpenter and the technical hand (artisan) in making the wooden pulpit or building the mosque

name_ar: باب مَنْ بَنَى مَسْجِدًا
name_en: (The superiority of) whoever built a mosque

name_ar: باب يَأْخُذُ بِنُصُولِ النَّبْلِ إِذَا مَرَّ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: While passing through a mosque, (one should better) hold the arrowheads (with the hand)

name_ar: باب الْمُرُورِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Passing through the mosque (is permissible)

name_ar: باب الشِّعْرِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: (What is said about) reciting poetry in the mosque?

name_ar: باب أَصْحَابِ الْحِرَابِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The presence of spearmen (with their spears) in the mosque (is permissible)

name_ar: باب ذِكْرِ الْبَيْعِ وَالشِّرَاءِ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Mentioning about sales and purchases on the pulpit in the mosque

name_ar: باب التَّقَاضِي وَالْمُلاَزَمَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Asking a debtor to repay what he owes and catching the debtor in the mosque

name_ar: باب كَنْسِ الْمَسْجِدِ وَالْتِقَاطِ الْخِرَقِ وَالْقَذَى وَالْعِيدَانِ
name_en: Sweeping (cleaning) of the mosque and removing rags, dirt and sticks from it

name_ar: باب تَحْرِيمِ تِجَارَةِ الْخَمْرِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The order of banning the trade of alcoholic drinks was issues in the mosque

name_ar: باب الْخَدَمِ لِلْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Servants for the mosque

name_ar: باب الأَسِيرِ أَوِ الْغَرِيمِ يُرْبَطُ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: To fasten a prisoner or a debtor in the mosque

name_ar: بَابُ الاِغْتِسَالِ إِذَا أَسْلَمَ، وَرَبْطِ الأَسِيرِ أَيْضًا فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: To take a bath on embracing Islam and fasten a prisoner in the mosque

name_ar: باب الْخَيْمَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ لِلْمَرْضَى وَغَيْرِهِمْ
name_en: To pitch a tent in the mosque for patients, etc

name_ar: باب إِدْخَالِ الْبَعِيرِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ لِلْعِلَّةِ
name_en: To take the camel inside the mosque if necessary

name_ar: باب
name_en: Chaper

name_ar: باب الْخَوْخَةِ وَالْمَمَرِّ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Al-Khaukhah (a small door) and a path in the mosque

name_ar: باب الأَبْوَابِ وَالْغَلَقِ لِلْكَعْبَةِ وَالْمَسَاجِدِ
name_en: The doors and locks of the Kabah and the mosques

name_ar: باب دُخُولِ الْمُشْرِكِ الْمَسْجِدَ
name_en: The entering of a pagan in the mosque

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الصَّوْتِ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ
name_en: Raising the voice in the mosque

name_ar: باب الْحِلَقِ وَالْجُلُوسِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: The religious gathering in circles and sitting in the mosque

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِلْقَاءِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ وَمَدِّ الرِّجْلِ
name_en: To lie flat (on the back) in the mosque

name_ar: باب الْمَسْجِدِ يَكُونُ فِي الطَّرِيقِ مِنْ غَيْرِ ضَرَرٍ بِالنَّاسِ
name_en: (If) a mosque (is built) on a road, it should not be a cause of harm for the people

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ السُّوقِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) in a mosque situated in a market

name_ar: باب تَشْبِيكِ الأَصَابِعِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ وَغَيْرِهِ
name_en: To clasp one's hands by interlocking the fingers in the mosque or outside the mosque

name_ar: بَابُ الْمَسَاجِدِ الَّتِي عَلَى طُرُقِ الْمَدِينَةِ
name_en: The mosques which are on the way to Al-Madina and the places where the Prophet (ﷺ) had offered Salat (Prayers)

name_ar: باب سُتْرَةُ الإِمَامِ سُتْرَةُ مَنْ خَلْفَهُ
name_en: The Sutra of the Imam is also a Sutra for those who are behind him

name_ar: باب قَدْرِ كَمْ يَنْبَغِي أَنْ يَكُونَ بَيْنَ الْمُصَلِّي وَالسُّتْرَةِ
name_en: What should be the distance between the person offering Salat (prayer) and the Sutra?

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى الْحَرْبَةِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) using a Harba (a short spear) (as a Sutra)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى الْعَنَزَةِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) using an 'Anaza (a spear-headed stick) (as a Sutra)

name_ar: باب السُّتْرَةِ بِمَكَّةَ وَغَيْرِهَا
name_en: Sutra (for the prayer)in Makkah and elsewhere.

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى الأُسْطُوَانَةِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) facing a pillar

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ بَيْنَ السَّوَارِي فِي غَيْرِ جَمَاعَةٍ
name_en: To offer non-congregational As-Salat (the prayers) between the pillars

name_ar: باب
باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى الرَّاحِلَةِ وَالْبَعِيرِ وَالشَّجَرِ وَالرَّحْلِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) facing a Rahila camel, a tree or a camel saddle as a Sutra).

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى السَّرِيرِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) facing a bed

name_ar: باب يَرُدُّ الْمُصَلِّي مَنْ مَرَّ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ
name_en: The person offering Salat (prayer) should repulse that person who tries to pass in front of him

name_ar: باب إِثْمِ الْمَارِّ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الْمُصَلِّي
name_en: The sin of a person who passes in front of a person offering Salat

name_ar: باب اسْتِقْبَالِ الرَّجُلِ صَاحِبَهُ أَوْ غَيْرَهُ فِي صَلاَتِهِ وَهُوَ يُصَلِّي
name_en: A man facing a man while offering Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ خَلْفَ النَّائِمِ
name_en: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) behind a sleeping person

name_ar: باب التَّطَوُّعِ خَلْفَ الْمَرْأَةِ
name_en: To offer Nawafil (non-obligatory prayers) behind a sleeping woman

name_ar: باب مَنْ قَالَ لاَ يَقْطَعُ الصَّلاَةَ شَىْءٌ
name_en: Whoever says "Nothing annuls As-Salat (the prayer) (i.e. nothing of what others do, not the praying person himself)."

name_ar: باب إِذَا حَمَلَ جَارِيَةً صَغِيرَةً عَلَى عُنُقِهِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: If a small girl is carried on one's neck during the Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب إِذَا صَلَّى إِلَى فِرَاشٍ فِيهِ حَائِضٌ
name_en: To offer Salat (prayer) facing a bed occupied by a menstruating woman

name_ar: باب هَلْ يَغْمِزُ الرَّجُلُ امْرَأَتَهُ عِنْدَ السُّجُودِ لِكَىْ يَسْجُدَ
name_en: Is it permissible to touch or push one's wife in prostration in order to prostrate properly?

name_ar: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَطْرَحُ عَنِ الْمُصَلِّي، شَيْئًا مِنَ الأَذَى
name_en: A woman can remove troublesome or offensive things from a person in Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب مَوَاقِيتِ الصَّلاَةِ وَفَضْلِهَا
name_en: The times of As-Salat (the prayers) and the superiority of offering Salat (prayers) in time

name_ar: بَابُ: {مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيْهِ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلاَةَ وَلاَ تَكُونُوا مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ}
name_en: The Statement of Allah

name_ar: باب الْبَيْعَةِ عَلَى إِقَامَةِ الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: To give the Bai'ah (pledge) for Iqamat-as-Salat [the offering of As-Salat (the prayers).

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةُ كَفَّارَةٌ
name_en: As-Salat (the prayers) is expiation (of sins)

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ لِوَقْتِهَا
name_en: Superiority of offering As-Salat (the prayers) at the stated times

name_ar: باب الصَّلَوَاتُ الْخَمْسُ كَفَّارَةٌ
name_en: The five Salat (prayers) are expiations (of sins)

name_ar: باب تَضْيِيعِ الصَّلاَةِ عَنْ وَقْتِهَا
name_en: Not offering As-Salat (the prayers) at its stated fixed time

name_ar: باب الْمُصَلِّي يُنَاجِي رَبَّهُ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ
name_en: A person in Salat (prayer) is speaking in private to his Lord (Allah)

name_ar: باب الإِبْرَادِ بِالظُّهْرِ فِي شِدَّةِ الْحَرِّ
name_en: In severe heat, offer Zuhr prayers when it becomes (a bit) cooler

name_ar: باب الإِبْرَادِ بِالظُّهْرِ فِي السَّفَرِ
name_en: When going on a journey, pray Zuhr prayer when it becomes cooler

name_ar: باب وَقْتِ الظُّهْرِ عِنْدَ الزَّوَالِ
name_en: The time of Zuhr prayer is when the sun declines (just after mid-day)

name_ar: باب تَأْخِيرِ الظُّهْرِ إِلَى الْعَصْرِ
name_en: To deny the Zuhr (prayer) up to the 'Asr (prayer) time

name_ar: باب وَقْتِ الْعَصْرِ
name_en: The time of the Asr prayer

name_ar: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ فَاتَتْهُ الْعَصْرُ
name_en: The sin of one who misses the 'Asr prayer (intentionally)

name_ar: باب مَنْ تَرَكَ الْعَصْرَ
name_en: One who omits (does not offer) the 'Asr prayer (intentionally)

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ صَلاَةِ الْعَصْرِ
name_en: Superiority of the 'Asr prayer

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ رَكْعَةً مِنَ الْعَصْرِ قَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
name_en: Whoever got (or was able to offer) only one Rak'a of the 'Asr prayer before sunset

name_ar: باب وَقْتِ الْمَغْرِبِ
name_en: The time of the Maghrib prayer (evening prayer)

name_ar: باب مَنْ كَرِهَ أَنْ يُقَالَ لِلْمَغْرِبِ الْعِشَاءُ
name_en: Whoever disliked to call the Maghrib prayer as the 'Isha' prayer

name_ar: باب ذِكْرِ الْعِشَاءِ وَالْعَتَمَةِ وَمَنْ رَآهُ وَاسِعًا
name_en: The mention of 'Isha' and 'Atama and whoever took the two names as one and the same

name_ar: باب وَقْتِ الْعِشَاءِ إِذَا اجْتَمَعَ النَّاسُ أَوْ تَأَخَّرُوا
name_en: The time of the Isha prayer. If the people get together (pray earlier), and if they come late (delay it)

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الْعِشَاءِ
name_en: Superiority of the 'Isha prayer

name_ar: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ النَّوْمِ قَبْلَ الْعِشَاءِ
name_en: What is disliked about sleeping before the 'Isha prayer

name_ar: باب النَّوْمِ قَبْلَ الْعِشَاءِ لِمَنْ غُلِبَ
name_en: Sleeping before the 'Isha prayer if (one is) over-whelmed by it (sleep)

name_ar: باب وَقْتِ الْعِشَاءِ إِلَى نِصْفِ اللَّيْلِ
name_en: Time of the 'Isha prayer is up to the middle of the night

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ صَلاَةِ الْفَجْرِ
name_en: Superiority of the Fajr (early morning) prayer

name_ar: باب وَقْتِ الْفَجْرِ
name_en: Time of the Fajr (early morning) prayer

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ رَكْعَةً
name_en: Whoever got (or was able to offer) one Rak'a of the Fajr prayer (in time). [One Rak'a means, one standing, one bowing, and two prostrations].

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَدْرَكَ مِنَ الصَّلاَةِ رَكْعَةً
name_en: Whoever got (or was able to offer) one Rak'a of a prayer (in time)

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْفَجْرِ حَتَّى تَرْتَفِعَ الشَّمْسُ
name_en: What is said regarding the offering of As-Salat (the prayers) between the Fajr prayer and sunrise.

name_ar: باب لاَ يَتَحَرَّى الصَّلاَةَ قَبْلَ غُرُوبِ الشَّمْسِ
name_en: One should not try to offer As-Salat (the prayers) just before sunset

name_ar: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَكْرَهِ الصَّلاَةَ إِلاَّ بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ وَالْفَجْرِ
name_en: Whoever did not dislike to offer optional prayers except after the compulsory prayers of 'Asr and Fajr only

name_ar: باب مَا يُصَلَّى بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ مِنَ الْفَوَائِتِ وَنَحْوِهَا
name_en: To offer the missed Salat (prayers) and the like after the 'Asr prayer

name_ar: باب التَّبْكِيرِ بِالصَّلاَةِ فِي يَوْمِ غَيْمٍ
name_en: To offer (the 'Asr prayers) earlier on a cloudy day

name_ar: باب الأَذَانِ بَعْدَ ذَهَابِ الْوَقْتِ
name_en: The Adhan for the Salat (prayer) after its stated time is over

name_ar: باب مَنْ صَلَّى بِالنَّاسِ جَمَاعَةً بَعْدَ ذَهَابِ الْوَقْتِ
name_en: Whoever led the people in Salat (prayer) after its time was over

name_ar: باب مَنْ نَسِيَ صَلاَةً فَلْيُصَلِّ إِذَا ذَكَرَهَا وَلاَ يُعِيدُ إِلاَّ تِلْكَ الصَّلاَةَ
name_en: One who forgets a Salat (prayer) should offer it when he remembers it, and should not repeat anything except that particular prayer

name_ar: باب قَضَاءِ الصَّلَوَاتِ الأُولَى فَالأُولَى
name_en: The Qada of prayers (Qada means to perform or offer or do a missed religious obligation after its stated time)

name_ar: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ السَّمَرِ بَعْدَ الْعِشَاءِ
name_en: What is disliked about talking after the 'Isha prayer

name_ar: باب السَّمَرِ فِي الْفِقْهِ وَالْخَيْرِ بَعْدَ الْعِشَاءِ
name_en: Talking about the Islamic jurisprudence and good things after the 'Isha prayer

name_ar: باب السَّمَرِ مَعَ الضَّيْفِ وَالأَهْلِ
name_en: To talk with the family and the guests after the 'sha prayer.

name_ar: باب بَدْءُ الأَذَانِ
name_en: How the Adhan for Salat (Prayer) was started

name_ar: باب الأَذَانُ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
name_en: Pronouncing the wording of Adhan for Salat (prayers) twice (in doubles)

name_ar: باب الإِقَامَةُ وَاحِدَةٌ، إِلاَّ قَوْلَهُ قَدْ قَامَتِ الصَّلاَةُ
name_en: To pronounce the wording of Iqama once (in singles) except Qad-qamat-is-Salat

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ التَّأْذِينِ
name_en: Superiority of the Adhan

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الصَّوْتِ بِالنِّدَاءِ
name_en: Raising the voice in pronouncing the Adhan

name_ar: باب مَا يُحْقَنُ بِالأَذَانِ مِنَ الدِّمَاءِ
name_en: To suspend fighting on hearing the Adhan

name_ar: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا سَمِعَ الْمُنَادِي
name_en: What to say on hearing the Adhan

name_ar: باب الدُّعَاءِ عِنْدَ النِّدَاءِ
name_en: Invocation at the time of Adhan

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِهَامِ فِي الأَذَانِ
name_en: To draw lots for pronouncing the Adhan

name_ar: باب الْكَلاَمِ فِي الأَذَانِ
name_en: Talking during the Adhan

name_ar: باب أَذَانِ الأَعْمَى إِذَا كَانَ لَهُ مَنْ يُخْبِرُهُ
name_en: The Adhan pronounced by a blind man (is permissible) when there is a person to inform him about the time of the Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب الأَذَانِ بَعْدَ الْفَجْرِ
name_en: The Adhan after Al-Fajr (dawn)

name_ar: باب الأَذَانِ قَبْلَ الْفَجْرِ
name_en: The Adhan before Al-Fajr (dawn)

name_ar: باب كَمْ بَيْنَ الأَذَانِ وَالإِقَامَةِ وَمَنْ يَنْتَظِرُ الإِقَامَةَ
name_en: How long should the interval between the Adhan and the Iqama be? (And something concerning) the person who wants for the Iqama

name_ar: باب مَنِ انْتَظَرَ الإِقَامَةَ
name_en: Whoever waits for the Iqama of the prayer

name_ar: باب بَيْنَ كُلِّ أَذَانَيْنِ صَلاَةٌ لِمَنْ شَاءَ
name_en: Between every two calls (Adhan and Iqama) there is a Salat (prayer) (that is optional) for the one who wants to offer it.

name_ar: باب مَنْ قَالَ لِيُؤَذِّنْ فِي السَّفَرِ مُؤَذِّنٌ وَاحِدٌ
name_en: Whoever said that there should be one Mu'adh-dhin in the journey

name_ar: باب الأَذَانِ لِلْمُسَافِرِ إِذَا كَانُوا جَمَاعَةً، وَالإِقَامَةِ، وَكَذَلِكَ بِعَرَفَةَ وَجَمْعٍ
name_en: If there are many travellers, Adhan and Iqama should be pronounced, (the same is to be observed) in 'Arafat and Al-Muzdalifa too

name_ar: باب هَلْ يَتَتَبَّعُ الْمُؤَذِّنُ فَاهُ هَا هُنَا وَهَا هُنَا، وَهَلْ يَلْتَفِتُ فِي الأَذَانِ
name_en: Should the Mu'adh-dhin turn his mouth (face) and look from side to side during the Adhan?

name_ar: باب قَوْلِ الرَّجُلِ فَاتَتْنَا الصَّلاَةُ
name_en: The saying of a person "We have missed As-Salat (the prayer)"

name_ar: باب لاَ يَسْعَى إِلَى الصَّلاَةِ، وَلْيَأْتِ بِالسَّكِينَةِ وَالْوَقَارِ
name_en: One should not run for As-Salat (the prayer) but present himself with calmness and solemnity

name_ar: باب مَتَى يَقُومُ النَّاسُ إِذَا رَأَوُا الإِمَامَ عِنْدَ الإِقَامَةِ
name_en: When should the people get up for the Salat (prayer) if they see the Imam (the person leading Salat) during the Iqama?

name_ar: باب لاَ يَسْعَى إِلَى الصَّلاَةِ مُسْتَعْجِلاً، وَلْيَقُمْ بِالسَّكِينَةِ وَالْوَقَارِ
name_en: One should not stand for As-Salat (the prayer) hurriedly but with calmness and solemnity.

name_ar: باب هَلْ يَخْرُجُ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ لِعِلَّةٍ
name_en: Can one go out of the mosque (after the Adhan, or the Iqama) if there is a genuine excuse?

name_ar: باب إِذَا قَالَ الإِمَامُ مَكَانَكُمْ. حَتَّى رَجَعَ انْتَظَرُوهُ
name_en: If the Imam says, "Remain at your places till I return", then wait for him

name_ar: باب قَوْلِ الرَّجُلِ مَا صَلَّيْنَا
name_en: The saying of a man to the Prophet (ﷺ), "We have not prayed."

name_ar: باب الإِمَامِ تَعْرِضُ لَهُ الْحَاجَةُ بَعْدَ الإِقَامَةِ
name_en: If the Imam is confronted with a problem after the Iqama

name_ar: باب الْكَلاَمِ إِذَا أُقِيمَتِ الصَّلاَةُ
name_en: To talk after the Iqama

name_ar: باب وُجُوبِ صَلاَةِ الْجَمَاعَةِ
name_en: Congregational Salat (prayer) is obligatory.

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ صَلاَةِ الْجَمَاعَةِ
name_en: Superiority of the congregational Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ صَلاَةِ الْفَجْرِ فِي جَمَاعَةٍ
name_en: Superiority of the Fajr (early morning) prayer in congregation.

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ التَّهْجِيرِ إِلَى الظُّهْرِ
name_en: The superiority of offering the Zuhr prayer early

name_ar: باب احْتِسَابِ الآثَارِ
name_en: Every step towards good deeds is rewarded

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الْعِشَاءِ فِي الْجَمَاعَةِ
name_en: The superiority of the 'Isha' prayer in congregation

name_ar: باب اثْنَانِ فَمَا فَوْقَهُمَا جَمَاعَةٌ
name_en: Two or more than two persons are considered as a group (for the congregational prayers)

name_ar: باب مَنْ جَلَسَ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ يَنْتَظِرُ الصَّلاَةَ، وَفَضْلِ الْمَسَاجِدِ
name_en: (The reward of a person) who waits for As-Salat (the prayer) in the mosque and the superiority of mosques

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ مَنْ غَدَا إِلَى الْمَسْجِدِ وَمَنْ رَاحَ
name_en: The superiority of going to the mosque (every) morning and in the afternoon and evening [for the congregational Salat (prayers)]

name_ar: باب إِذَا أُقِيمَتِ الصَّلاَةُ فَلاَ صَلاَةَ إِلاَّ الْمَكْتُوبَةَ
name_en: No Salat (prayer) (is to be offered) except the compulsory Salat after the Iqama has been pronounced for that compulsory Salat

name_ar: باب حَدِّ الْمَرِيضِ أَنْ يَشْهَدَ الْجَمَاعَةَ
name_en: The limit set for a patient to attend the congregational Salat (prayer)?

name_ar: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الْمَطَرِ وَالْعِلَّةِ أَنْ يُصَلِّيَ فِي رَحْلِهِ
name_en: It is permissible to pray at one's dwelling during rain or if there is a genuine excuse

name_ar: باب هَلْ يُصَلِّي الإِمَامُ بِمَنْ حَضَرَ وَهَلْ يَخْطُبُ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ فِي الْمَطَرِ
name_en: Can the Imam offer the Salat (prayer) with only those who are present (for the prayer)? And can be deliver a Khutba (religious talk) on Friday if it is raining?

name_ar: باب إِذَا حَضَرَ الطَّعَامُ وَأُقِيمَتِ الصَّلاَةُ
name_en: (WHat should one do) if the meal has been served and the Iqama has been pronounced for As-Salat(the prayer)

name_ar: باب إِذَا دُعِيَ الإِمَامُ إِلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَبِيَدِهِ مَا يَأْكُلُ
name_en: When the Imam is called for As-Salat (the prayer) while he has in his hands something to eat.

name_ar: باب مَنْ كَانَ فِي حَاجَةِ أَهْلِهِ فَأُقِيمَتِ الصَّلاَةُ فَخَرَجَ
name_en: If somebody was busy with his domestic work and Iqama was pronounced and then he came out [for offering the Salat (prayer)]

name_ar: باب مَنْ صَلَّى بِالنَّاسِ وَهْوَ لاَ يُرِيدُ إِلاَّ أَنْ يُعَلِّمَهُمْ صَلاَةَ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَسُنَّتَهُ
name_en: Offering Salat (prayer) in front of the people with the sole intention of teaching them the Salat of the Prophet (ﷺ) and his Sunnah (legal ways etc.)

name_ar: باب أَهْلُ الْعِلْمِ وَالْفَضْلِ أَحَقُّ بِالإِمَامَةِ
name_en: The religious learned men are entitled to precedence in leading the Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب مَنْ قَامَ إِلَى جَنْبِ الإِمَامِ لِعِلَّةٍ
name_en: Whoever stood by the side of the Imam because of a genuine cause [in Salat (prayer)]

name_ar: باب مَنْ دَخَلَ لِيَؤُمَّ النَّاسَ فَجَاءَ الإِمَامُ الأَوَّلُ فَتَأَخَّرَ الأَوَّلُ أَوْ لَمْ يَتَأَخَّرْ جَازَتْ صَلاَتُهُ‏
name_en: If somebody is leading the Salat (prayer) and (in the meanwhile) the first (usual) Imam comes, the Salat is valid whether the former retreats or does not retreat

name_ar: باب إِذَا اسْتَوَوْا فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فَلْيَؤُمَّهُمْ أَكْبَرُهُمْ
name_en: If some people are equally proficient in the recitation of the Quran (and religious knowledge), the oldest of them should lead As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب إِذَا زَارَ الإِمَامُ قَومًا فَأَمَّهُمْ
name_en: If the Imam visited some people and led them in Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب إِنَّمَا جُعِلَ الإِمَامُ لِيُؤْتَمَّ بِهِ
name_en: The Imam is appointed to be followed

name_ar: باب مَتَى يَسْجُدُ مَنْ خَلْفَ الإِمَامِ
name_en: When should those who are behind the Imam prostrate?

name_ar: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ رَفَعَ رَأْسَهُ قَبْلَ الإِمَامِ
name_en: The sin of the one who raises his head before the Imam (raises his head)

name_ar: باب إِمَامَةِ الْعَبْدِ وَالْمَوْلَى
name_en: A slave or a manumitted slave can lead the Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب إِذَا لَمْ يُتِمَّ الإِمَامُ وَأَتَمَّ مَنْ خَلْفَهُ
name_en: If the Imam does not offer the Salat (prayer) perfectly and the followers offer it perfectly

name_ar: باب إِمَامَةِ الْمَفْتُونِ وَالْمُبْتَدِعِ
name_en: Offering prayers behind a man who is a victim of Al-Fitan (trials and affections) or a heretic.

name_ar: باب يَقُومُ عَنْ يَمِينِ الإِمَامِ، بِحِذَائِهِ سَوَاءً إِذَا كَانَا اثْنَيْنِ
name_en: To stand on the right side of the Imam on the same line if only two persons (counting the Imam) are offering Salat (prayer) in congregation

name_ar: باب إِذَا قَامَ الرَّجُلُ عَنْ يَسَارِ الإِمَامِ، فَحَوَّلَهُ الإِمَامُ إِلَى يَمِينِهِ لَمْ تَفْسُدْ صَلاَتُهُمَا
name_en: If a man stood on the left side of the Imam and the Imam drew him to his right side, then the Salat of none of them would be invalid

name_ar: باب إِذَا لَمْ يَنْوِ الإِمَامُ أَنْ يَؤُمَّ ثُمَّ جَاءَ قَوْمٌ فَأَمَّهُمْ
name_en: If the Imam has not had the intention of leading the prayer and then some persons join him and he leads them

name_ar: باب إِذَا طَوَّلَ الإِمَامُ وَكَانَ لِلرَّجُلِ حَاجَةٌ فَخَرَجَ فَصَلَّى
name_en: If the Imam prolongs the Salat (prayer) and somebody has an urgent work or need and so he leaves the congregation and offers Salat alone.

name_ar: باب تَخْفِيفِ الإِمَامِ فِي الْقِيَامِ وَإِتْمَامِ الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
name_en: The shortening of the Qiyam (standing) by the Imam[in Salat (prayer)] but performing the bowings and the prostrations perfectly

name_ar: باب إِذَا صَلَّى لِنَفْسِهِ فَلْيُطَوِّلْ مَا شَاءَ
name_en: When offering Salat (prayer) alone, one can prolong the Salat as much as one wishes

name_ar: باب مَنْ شَكَا إِمَامَهُ إِذَا طَوَّلَ
name_en: Complaining against one's Imam if he prolongs the prayer.

name_ar: باب الإِيجَازِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَإِكْمَالِهَا
name_en: The shortening and perfection of the prayer (by the Imam)

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَخَفَّ الصَّلاَةَ عِنْدَ بُكَاءِ الصَّبِيِّ
name_en: Whoever cuts short As-Salat (the prayer) on hearing the cries of a child.

name_ar: باب إِذَا صَلَّى ثُمَّ أَمَّ قَوْمًا
name_en: If one offers Salat (prayer) and the leads the people in Salat.

name_ar: باب مَنْ أَسْمَعَ النَّاسَ تَكْبِيرَ الإِمَامِ
name_en: One who repeats the Takbir (Allahu Akbar) of the Imam so that the people may hear it.

name_ar: باب الرَّجُلُ يَأْتَمُّ بِالإِمَامِ وَيَأْتَمُّ النَّاسُ بِالْمَأْمُومِ
name_en: If a person follows the Imam and the others follow that person (then it is all right)

name_ar: باب هَلْ يَأْخُذُ الإِمَامُ إِذَا شَكَّ بِقَوْلِ النَّاسِ
name_en: Can the Imam depend on the people's saying if he is in doubt (about a certain matter)?

name_ar: باب إِذَا بَكَى الإِمَامُ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: If the Imam weeps in As-Salat (the prayers) (will his Salat be valid?)

name_ar: باب تَسْوِيَةِ الصُّفُوفِ عِنْدَ الإِقَامَةِ وَبَعْدَهَا
name_en: Straightening the rows at the time of Iqama and after it (immediately)

name_ar: باب إِقْبَالِ الإِمَامِ عَلَى النَّاسِ عِنْدَ تَسْوِيَةِ الصُّفُوفِ
name_en: Facing of the Imam towards his followers while straightening the rows.

name_ar: باب الصَّفِّ الأَوَّلِ
name_en: The first row

name_ar: باب إِقَامَةِ الصَّفِّ مِنْ تَمَامِ الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: The straightening of the rows is amongst those obligatory and good things which make your As-Salat (the prayer) a correct and perfect one.

name_ar: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ لَمْ يُتِمَّ الصُّفُوفَ
name_en: The sin of a person who does not complete the rows (who is out of alignment) for the prayer

name_ar: باب إِلْزَاقِ الْمَنْكِبِ بِالْمَنْكِبِ وَالْقَدَمِ بِالْقَدَمِ فِي الصَّفِّ
name_en: To stand shoulder to shoulder and foot to foot in a row

name_ar: باب إِذَا قَامَ الرَّجُلُ عَنْ يَسَارِ الإِمَامِ، وَحَوَّلَهُ الإِمَامُ خَلْفَهُ إِلَى يَمِينِهِ، تَمَّتْ صَلاَتُهُ
name_en: If a person stands by the left side of the Imam, and the Imam dress him to the right from behind, the Salat (prayer) is correct.

name_ar: باب الْمَرْأَةُ وَحْدَهَا تَكُونُ صَفًّا
name_en: One woman can form a row

name_ar: باب مَيْمَنَةِ الْمَسْجِدِ وَالإِمَامِ
name_en: The right side of the mosque and the place to the right of the Imam

name_ar: باب إِذَا كَانَ بَيْنَ الإِمَامِ وَبَيْنَ الْقَوْمِ حَائِطٌ أَوْ سُتْرَةٌ
name_en: If there is a wall or a Sutra between the Imam and followers

name_ar: باب صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ
name_en: The night prayer.

name_ar: باب إِيجَابِ التَّكْبِيرِ وَافْتِتَاحِ الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: The necessity of saying the Takbir, i.e., Allahu Akbar (Allah is the Most Great) and the commencement of As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ فِي التَّكْبِيرَةِ الأُولَى مَعَ الاِفْتِتَاحِ سَوَاءً
name_en: To raise both hands on saying the first Takbir simultaneously with opening the Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ إِذَا كَبَّرَ وَإِذَا رَكَعَ وَإِذَا رَفَعَ
name_en: To raise both hands while saying the Takbir [on opening As-Salat (the prayer)], and while bowing and on raising up the head (after bowing)

name_ar: باب إِلَى أَيْنَ يَرْفَعُ يَدَيْهِ
name_en: To what level should one raise one's hand.

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ إِذَا قَامَ مِنَ الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ
name_en: To raise one's hands after finishing the second Rak'a (on standing for the third Rak'a)

name_ar: باب وَضْعِ الْيُمْنَى عَلَى الْيُسْرَى
name_en: To place the right hand on the left [in As-Salt (the prayers)]

name_ar: باب الْخُشُوعِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: Submissiveness in As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب مَا يَقُولُ بَعْدَ التَّكْبِيرِ
name_en: What to say after the Takbir

name_ar: باب
باب رَفْعِ الْبَصَرِ إِلَى الإِمَامِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: To cast a look at the Imam during As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الْبَصَرِ إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: Looking towards the sky during As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب الاِلْتِفَاتِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: To look hither and thither in As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب هَلْ يَلْتَفِتُ لأَمْرٍ يَنْزِلُ بِهِ أَوْ يَرَى شَيْئًا أَوْ بُصَاقًا فِي الْقِبْلَةِ
name_en: Is it permissible to one to look around in Salat (prayer) if something happens to one? Or can one look at something like expectoration in the direction of the Qiblah?

name_ar: باب وُجُوبِ الْقِرَاءَةِ لِلإِمَامِ وَالْمَأْمُومِ فِي الصَّلَوَاتِ كُلِّهَا فِي الْحَضَرِ وَالسَّفَرِ وَمَا يُجْهَرُ فِيهَا وَمَا يُخَافَتُ
name_en: Recitation of the Qur'an (Surat Al-Fatiha) is compulsory for the Imam and the followers, at the home and on journey, in all As-Salat (the prayers) whether the recitation is done silently or aloud.

name_ar: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الظُّهْرِ
name_en: The recitation of the Qur'an in a Zuhr prayer

name_ar: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعَصْرِ
name_en: The recitation of the Qur'an in the 'Asr prayer

name_ar: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْمَغْرِبِ
name_en: The recitation of the Qur'an in the Maghrib prayer

name_ar: باب الْجَهْرِ فِي الْمَغْرِبِ
name_en: To recite aloud in the Maghrib prayer.

name_ar: باب الْجَهْرِ فِي الْعِشَاءِ
name_en: To recite aloud in the 'Isha' prayer.

name_ar: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِشَاءِ بِالسَّجْدَةِ
name_en: To recite in the 'Isha prayer, with As-Sajda(prostration)

name_ar: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِشَاءِ
name_en: Recitation in the 'Isha prayer

name_ar: باب يُطَوِّلُ فِي الأُولَيَيْنِ وَيَحْذِفُ فِي الأُخْرَيَيْنِ
name_en: Prolonging the first two Rak'a and shortening the last two

name_ar: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْفَجْرِ
name_en: The recitation of the Qur'an in the Fajr prayer

name_ar: باب الْجَهْرِ بِقِرَاءَةِ صَلاَةِ الْفَجْرِ
name_en: To recite aloud in the Fajr (early morning) prayer.

name_ar: باب الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ السُّورَتَيْنِ فِي الرَّكْعَةِ
name_en: To recite two Surah in one Rak'a and to recite the last verses of some Surah, or to elite the Surah in their reverse order, or to recite the beginning of a Surah

name_ar: باب يَقْرَأُ فِي الأُخْرَيَيْنِ بِفَاتِحَةِ الْكِتَابِ
name_en: To recite only Surah Al-Fatiha in the last two Rak'a during a four Rak'a Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب مَنْ خَافَتَ الْقِرَاءَةَ فِي الظُّهْرِ وَالْعَصْرِ
name_en: To recite (the Qur'an) quietly in the Zuhr and 'Asr prayers

name_ar: باب إِذَا أَسْمَعَ الإِمَامُ الآيَةَ
name_en: (In a quiet prayer) if the Imam recites a Verse or so audibly

name_ar: باب يُطَوِّلُ فِي الرَّكْعَةِ الأُولَى
name_en: To prolong the first Rak'a

name_ar: باب جَهْرِ الإِمَامِ بِالتَّأْمِينِ
name_en: Saying of Amin aloud by the Imam

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ التَّأْمِينِ
name_en: Superiority of saying Amin

name_ar: باب جَهْرِ الْمَأْمُومِ بِالتَّأْمِينِ
name_en: Saying of Amin aloud by the followers

name_ar: باب إِذَا رَكَعَ دُونَ الصَّفِّ
name_en: If someone bowed behind the rows, [on entering the mosque and before joining the rows of Salat (prayer)]

name_ar: باب إِتْمَامِ التَّكْبِيرِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ
name_en: Itmam At-Takbir (i.e., to end the number of Takbir or to say the Takbir perfectly) on bowing. [See Fath Al-Bari]

name_ar: باب إِتْمَامِ التَّكْبِيرِ فِي السُّجُودِ
name_en: Itmam At-Takbir (i.e., to end the number of Takbir, or to say the Takbir perfectly) on prostrating. [See Fath Al-Bari]

name_ar: باب التَّكْبِيرِ إِذَا قَامَ مِنَ السُّجُودِ
name_en: Saying the Takbir on rising from the prostration

name_ar: باب وَضْعِ الأَكُفِّ عَلَى الرُّكَبِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ
name_en: To put the hands (palms) on both knees while bowing.

name_ar: باب إِذَا لَمْ يُتِمَّ الرُّكُوعَ
name_en: Not performing bowing perfectly

name_ar: بَابُ اسْتِوَاءِ الظَّهْرِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ
name_en: To keep the back straight in bowing.

name_ar: باب حَدِّ إِتْمَامِ الرُّكُوعِ وَالاِعْتِدَالِ فِيهِ وَالاِطْمَأْنِينَةِ
name_en: And what is said regarding the limit of the completion of bowing and of keeping the back straight and the calmness with which it is performed.

name_ar: باب أَمْرِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم الَّذِي لاَ يُتِمُّ رُكُوعَهُ بِالإِعَادَةِ
name_en: The order of the Prophet (ﷺ) to a person who did not perform his bowing perfectly that he should repeat his Salat (prayer)

name_ar: باب الدُّعَاءِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ
name_en: Invocation in bowing.

name_ar: باب مَا يَقُولُ الإِمَامُ وَمَنْ خَلْفَهُ إِذَا رَفَعَ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ الرُّكُوعِ
name_en: What the Imam and the followers say on raising their heads from bowing.

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا لَكَ الْحَمْدُ
name_en: The superiority of saying Allahumma Rabbana lakal hamd (O Allah, Our Lord!, All the praises and thanks are for You)

name_ar: باب
باب الاِطْمَأْنِينَةِ حِينَ يَرْفَعُ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ الرُّكُوعِ
name_en: To stand Straight with calmness on raising the head from bowing

name_ar: باب يَهْوِي بِالتَّكْبِيرِ حِينَ يَسْجُدُ
name_en: One should say Takbir while going in prostration.

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ السُّجُودِ
name_en: Superiority of prostrating.

name_ar: باب يُبْدِي ضَبْعَيْهِ وَيُجَافِي فِي السُّجُودِ
name_en: During the prostrations one should keep one's arms away from one's sides and the abdomen should be kept away from the thighs.

name_ar: بَابُ يَسْتَقْبِلُ بِأَطْرَافِ رِجْلَيْهِ الْقِبْلَةَ
name_en: One should keep the toes in the direction of the Qiblah

name_ar: باب إِذَا لَمْ يُتِمَّ السُّجُودَ
name_en: If one does not perform the prostrations perfectly

name_ar: باب السُّجُودِ عَلَى سَبْعَةِ أَعْظُمٍ
name_en: To prostrate on seven bones

name_ar: باب السُّجُودِ عَلَى الأَنْفِ
name_en: To prostrate on the nose

name_ar: باب السُّجُودِ عَلَى الأَنْفِ وَالسُّجُودِ عَلَى الطِّينِ
name_en: To prostrate on the nose and in the mud

name_ar: باب عَقْدِ الثِّيَابِ وَشَدِّهَا
name_en: To tie the clothes and wrap them properly [in Salat (prayer)]; and whoever gathered his clothes for fear that his private parts may become exposed.

name_ar: باب لاَ يَكُفُّ شَعَرًا
name_en: One should not tuck put the hair [during Salat (prayers)]

name_ar: باب لاَ يَكُفُّ ثَوْبَهُ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: One should not tuck up his garment in As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب التَّسْبِيحِ وَالدُّعَاءِ فِي السُّجُودِ
name_en: To invoke and glorify Allah in prostration

name_ar: باب الْمُكْثِ بَيْنَ السَّجْدَتَيْنِ
name_en: To sit for a while between the two prostrations

name_ar: باب لاَ يَفْتَرِشُ ذِرَاعَيْهِ فِي السُّجُودِ
name_en: One should not put the forearms on the ground during prostrations

name_ar: باب مَنِ اسْتَوَى قَاعِدًا فِي وِتْرٍ مِنْ صَلاَتِهِ ثُمَّ نَهَضَ
name_en: Sitting Straight in a Witr prayer (i.e., an odd Rak'a) and then getting up.

name_ar: باب كَيْفَ يَعْتَمِدُ عَلَى الأَرْضِ إِذَا قَامَ مِنَ الرَّكْعَةِ
name_en: How to support oneself on the ground while standing after finishing the Rak'a (after the two prostrations)

name_ar: باب يُكَبِّرُ وَهْوَ يَنْهَضُ مِنَ السَّجْدَتَيْنِ
name_en: Saying Takbir on rising from the two prostrations

name_ar: باب سُنَّةِ الْجُلُوسِ فِي التَّشَهُّدِ
name_en: The Prophet's Sunnah (legal way) for the sitting in the Tashahhud [in the Salat (prayer)].

name_ar: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَرَ التَّشَهُّدَ الأَوَّلَ وَاجِبًا لأَنَّ النَّبِيَّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ قَامَ مِنَ الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ وَلَمْ يَرْجِعْ
name_en: Whoever considered that the first Tashahhud is not compulsory

name_ar: باب التَّشَهُّدِ فِي الأُولَى
name_en: (Saying of the) Tashahhud in the first sitting.

name_ar: باب التَّشَهُّدِ فِي الآخِرَةِ
name_en: (Saying of the) Tashahhud in the last Rak'a

name_ar: باب الدُّعَاءِ قَبْلَ السَّلاَمِ
name_en: Invocation before the Taslim

name_ar: باب مَا يُتَخَيَّرُ مِنَ الدُّعَاءِ بَعْدَ التَّشَهُّدِ وَلَيْسَ بِوَاجِبٍ
name_en: What optional invocation may be selected after the Tashahhud, and it is not obligatory.

name_ar: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَمْسَحْ جَبْهَتَهُ وَأَنْفَهُ حَتَّى صَلَّى
name_en: No cleaning (rubbing) one's forehead and nose till one has completed As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب التَّسْلِيمِ
name_en: Taslim [turning the face to the right and then to the left and saying "As-Salamu alaikum wa rah mat-ullah" at the end of the Salat (prayers)]

name_ar: باب يُسَلِّمُ حِينَ يُسَلِّمُ الإِمَامُ
name_en: To finish the Salat (prayer) with Taslim along with the Imam

name_ar: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَرَ رَدَّ السَّلاَمِ عَلَى الإِمَامِ وَاكْتَفَى بِتَسْلِيمِ الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: Whoever did not say (a Taslim) in addition to the Taslim of the Imam but thought that Taslim of the Salat (prayer) was sufficient

name_ar: باب الذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ
name_en: The Dhikr (remembering Allah by Glorifying, Praising and Magnifying Him) after As-Salat (the prayer)

name_ar: باب يَسْتَقْبِلُ الإِمَامُ النَّاسَ إِذَا سَلَّمَ
name_en: The Imam should face the followers after finishing the prayer with Taslim.

name_ar: باب مُكْثِ الإِمَامِ فِي مُصَلاَّهُ بَعْدَ السَّلاَمِ
name_en: The staying of the Imam at his Musalla (praying place) after (finishing the prayer with) Taslim

name_ar: باب مَنْ صَلَّى بِالنَّاسِ فَذَكَرَ حَاجَةً فَتَخَطَّاهُمْ
name_en: Whoever led the people in Salat (prayer) and remembered an rent matter or necessity and had to pass over the people (to carry out that)

name_ar: باب الاِنْفِتَالِ وَالاِنْصِرَافِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ، وَالشِّمَالِ
name_en: To leave or depart from the right and from the left after finishing from the Salat (prayers).

name_ar: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الثُّومِ النَّىِّ وَالْبَصَلِ وَالْكُرَّاثِ
name_en: What has been said about uncooked garlic, onion and leek.

name_ar: باب وُضُوءِ الصِّبْيَانِ
name_en: The ablution for boys (youngsters). When they should perform Ghusl (take a bath) and Tuhur (purification). Their attendance at congregational prayers and their rows in the prayers.

name_ar: باب خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ إِلَى الْمَسَاجِدِ بِاللَّيْلِ وَالْغَلَسِ
name_en: Going of women to the mosque at night and in darkness

name_ar: باب انْتِظَارِ النَّاسِ قِيَامَ الإِمَامِ الْعَالِمِ
name_en: The waiting of the people for the religious learned Imam to get up (after the prayer to depart)

name_ar: باب صَلاَةِ النِّسَاءِ خَلْفَ الرِّجَالِ
name_en: The Salat (prayer) of women behind men

name_ar: باب سُرْعَةِ انْصِرَافِ النِّسَاءِ مِنَ الصُّبْحِ، وَقِلَّةِ مَقَامِهِنَّ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: Returning of the women immediately after the Fajr prayer and their staying in the mosque for a short period only

name_ar: باب اسْتِئْذَانِ الْمَرْأَةِ زَوْجَهَا بِالْخُرُوجِ إِلَى الْمَسْجِدِ
name_en: A woman shall ask her husband's permission (on wishing) to go to the mosque.

name_ar: باب صَلاَةِ النِّسَاءِ خَلْفَ الرِّجَالِ
name_en: Women praying behind men

name_ar: باب فَرْضِ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: The prescription of Jumu'ah prayer and Khutba

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الْغُسْلِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ، وَهَلْ عَلَى الصَّبِيِّ شُهُودُ يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ أَوْ عَلَى النِّسَاءِ
name_en: The superiority of taking a bath on friday

name_ar: باب الطِّيبِ لِلْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: To perfume before going for the Friday (prayer)

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: The superiority of Jumu'ah (prayer and Khutba)

name_ar: باب
باب الدُّهْنِ لِلْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: To use(hair) oil for the Friday prayer

name_ar: باب يَلْبَسُ أَحْسَنَ مَا يَجِدُ
name_en: To wear the best clothes (for the Jumu'ah prayer)

name_ar: باب السِّوَاكِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: To clean the teeth with Siwak on Friday

name_ar: باب مَنْ تَسَوَّكَ بِسِوَاكِ غَيْرِهِ
name_en: Whoever cleans his teeth with Siwak

name_ar: باب مَا يُقْرَأُ فِي صَلاَةِ الْفَجْرِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: What should be recited in the Fajr prayer on Friday

name_ar: باب الْجُمُعَةِ فِي الْقُرَى وَالْمُدْنِ
name_en: To offer Jumu'ah prayer and Khutba in villages and towns

name_ar: باب هَلْ عَلَى مَنْ لَمْ يَشْهَدِ الْجُمُعَةَ غُسْلٌ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ وَالصِّبْيَانِ وَغَيْرِهِمْ
name_en: Is the bath necessary for those who do not present themselves for the Jumu'ah prayer

name_ar: باب
باب الرُّخْصَةِ إِنْ لَمْ يَحْضُرِ الْجُمُعَةَ فِي الْمَطَرِ
name_en: Not to attend the Jumu'ah (prayer) if it is raining.

name_ar: بَابُ مِنْ أَيْنَ تُؤْتَى الْجُمُعَةُ وَعَلَى مَنْ تَجِبُ
name_en: For whom is the Jumu'ah (prayer) compulsory?

name_ar: باب وَقْتُ الْجُمُعَةِ إِذَا زَالَتِ الشَّمْسُ
name_en: The time for the Jumu'ah (prayer)

name_ar: باب إِذَا اشْتَدَّ الْحَرُّ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: If it becomes very hot on Fridays

name_ar: باب الْمَشْىِ إِلَى الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: To go walking unhurriedly

name_ar: باب لاَ يُفَرَّقُ بَيْنَ اثْنَيْنِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: One should not separate two persons on Fridays

name_ar: باب لاَ يُقِيمُ الرَّجُلُ أَخَاهُ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ وَيَقْعُدُ فِي مَكَانِهِ
name_en: A man should not make his brother get up to sit in his place

name_ar: باب الأَذَانِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: Adhan on Friday (for the Jumu'ah prayer)

name_ar: باب الْمُؤَذِّنِ الْوَاحِدِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: One Mu'adh-dhin on Friday

name_ar: باب يُؤَذِّنُ الإِمَامُ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ إِذَا سَمِعَ النِّدَاءَ
name_en: The Imam repeats the wordings of the Adhan when he hears it

name_ar: باب الْجُلُوسِ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ عِنْدَ التَّأْذِينِ
name_en: To sit on the pulpit while Adhan is pronounced

name_ar: باب التَّأْذِينِ عِنْدَ الْخُطْبَةِ
name_en: Adhan before delivering the Khutba

name_ar: باب الْخُطْبَةِ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ
name_en: (to deliver) the Khutba on the pulpit

name_ar: باب الْخُطْبَةِ قَائِمًا
name_en: To deliver the Khutba while standing

name_ar: باب يَسْتَقْبِلُ الإِمَامُ الْقَوْمَ وَاسْتِقْبَالِ النَّاسِ الإِمَامَ إِذَا خَطَبَ
name_en: The facing of the Imam towards the people

name_ar: باب مَنْ قَالَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ بَعْدَ الثَّنَاءِ أَمَّا بَعْدُ
name_en: Saying "Ammaba'du" in the Khutba

name_ar: باب الْقَعْدَةِ بَيْنَ الْخُطْبَتَيْنِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: To sit in between the two Khutba

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِمَاعِ إِلَى الْخُطْبَةِ
name_en: To listen to the Khutba (religious talk) on Friday

name_ar: باب إِذَا رَأَى الإِمَامُ رَجُلاً جَاءَ وَهْوَ يَخْطُبُ أَمَرَهُ أَنْ يُصَلِّيَ رَكْعَتَيْنِ
name_en: During the Khutba, two Rak'a Salat before sitting (Tahayyat-ul-Masjid)

name_ar: باب مَنْ جَاءَ وَالإِمَامُ يَخْطُبُ صَلَّى رَكْعَتَيْنِ خَفِيفَتَيْنِ
name_en: When the Imam is delivering the Khutba, a light two Rak'a Salat (prayer) (Tahayyat-ul Masjid)

name_ar: باب رَفْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
name_en: To raise hands during the Khutba (religious talk)

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: Istisqa' in the Khutba on Friday

name_ar: باب الإِنْصَاتِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ وَالإِمَامُ يَخْطُبُ
name_en: One should keep quiet and listen while the Imam is delivering the Khutba

name_ar: باب السَّاعَةِ الَّتِي فِي يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: An hour (opportune-lucky time) on Friday

name_ar: باب إِذَا نَفَرَ النَّاسُ عَنِ الإِمَامِ فِي صَلاَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ فَصَلاَةُ الإِمَامِ وَمَنْ بَقِيَ جَائِزَةٌ
name_en: If some people leave while the Imam during the Salat-ul-Jumu'ah

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْجُمُعَةِ وَقَبْلَهَا
name_en: To offer Salat before and after the Jumu'ah prayer

name_ar: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ الصَّلاَةُ فَانْتَشِرُوا فِي الأَرْضِ وَابْتَغُوا مِنْ فَضْلِ اللَّهِ}
name_en: When the Salat is ended, you may disperse through the land, and seek of the Bounty of Allah

name_ar: باب الْقَائِلَةِ بَعْدَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: The afternoon nap after the Jumu'ah (prayer)

name_ar: باب صَلاَةِ الْخَوْفِ
name_en: The Salat-ul-Khauf

name_ar: باب صَلاَةِ الْخَوْفِ رِجَالاً وَرُكْبَانًا رَاجِلٌ قَائِمٌ
name_en: The Salat-ul-Khauf while standing or riding

name_ar: باب يَحْرُسُ بَعْضُهُمْ بَعْضًا فِي صَلاَةِ الْخَوْفِ
name_en: To guard one another during the Salat-ul-Khauf

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ مُنَاهَضَةِ الْحُصُونِ وَلِقَاءِ الْعَدُوِّ
name_en: As-Salat at the time of besieging a fort and at the time of meeting the enemy

name_ar: بَابُ صَلاَةِ الطَّالِبِ وَالْمَطْلُوبِ رَاكِبًا وَإِيمَاءً
name_en: The chaser and the chased can offer Salat (prayer) while riding , and by signs

name_ar: باب التَّبْكِيرِ وَالْغَلَسِ بِالصُّبْحِ وَالصَّلاَةِ عِنْدَ الإِغَارَةِ وَالْحَرْبِ
name_en: Offering As-Salat (the prayers) while attacking the enemy and in battles

name_ar: باب فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ وَالتَّجَمُّلِ فِيهِ
name_en: The two Eid and sprucing oneself up on them

name_ar: باب الْحِرَابِ وَالدَّرَقِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
name_en: A display of spears and shields on 'Eid Festival day

name_ar: باب سُنَّةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ لأَهْلِ الإِسْلاَمِ
name_en: The legal way of the celebrations on the two 'Eid festivals

name_ar: باب الأَكْلِ يَوْمَ الْفِطْرِ قَبْلَ الْخُرُوجِ
name_en: Eating on the day of Fitr before the 'Eid-al-Fitr

name_ar: باب الأَكْلِ يَوْمَ النَّحْرِ
name_en: Eating on the day of Nahr (10th of Dhul-Hijjah)

name_ar: باب الْخُرُوجِ إِلَى الْمُصَلَّى بِغَيْرِ مِنْبَرٍ
name_en: To proceed to a masjid without a pulpit

name_ar: باب الْمَشْىِ وَالرُّكُوبِ إِلَى الْعِيدِ بِغَيْرِ أَذَانٍ وَلاَ إِقَامَةٍ
name_en: Eid prayer before the Khutba and no Adhan or Iqama for it

name_ar: باب الْخُطْبَةِ بَعْدَ الْعِيدِ
name_en: The Khutba after the Eid prayer

name_ar: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنْ حَمْلِ السِّلاَحِ فِي الْعِيدِ وَالْحَرَمِ
name_en: It is disliked to carry arms on 'Eid and in the Haram

name_ar: باب التَّبْكِيرِ إِلَى الْعِيدِ
name_en: To offer the Eid prayer early

name_ar: باب فَضْلِ الْعَمَلِ فِي أَيَّامِ التَّشْرِيقِ
name_en: Superiority of deeds on the days of Tashriq

name_ar: باب التَّكْبِيرِ أَيَّامَ مِنًى وَإِذَا غَدَا إِلَى عَرَفَةَ
name_en: To say Takbir on the days of Mina and while proceeding to Arafat

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى الْحَرْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
name_en: As-Salat using a small spear as a Sutra

name_ar: باب حَمْلِ الْعَنَزَةِ أَوِ الْحَرْبَةِ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الإِمَامِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
name_en: To put the 'Anaza (spear-headed stick) or Harba in front of the Imam on Eid day

name_ar: باب خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ وَالْحُيَّضِ إِلَى الْمُصَلَّى
name_en: The coming out of the ladies and menstruating women to the Masjid

name_ar: باب خُرُوجِ الصِّبْيَانِ إِلَى الْمُصَلَّى
name_en: The attendance of boys at Musalla

name_ar: باب اسْتِقْبَالِ الإِمَامِ النَّاسَ فِي خُطْبَةِ الْعِيدِ
name_en: The Imam faces the people while delivering the Khutba (religious talk) of Eid

name_ar: باب الْعَلَمِ الَّذِي بِالْمُصَلَّى
name_en: The mark of the Musall

name_ar: باب مَوْعِظَةِ الإِمَامِ النِّسَاءَ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
name_en: The preaching to the woman by the Imam on Eid day

name_ar: باب إِذَا لَمْ يَكُنْ لَهَا جِلْبَابٌ فِي الْعِيدِ
name_en: If a woman has no veil to use for Eid

name_ar: باب اعْتِزَالِ الْحُيَّضِ الْمُصَلَّى
name_en: Menstruating women should keep away from the Mussalla

name_ar: باب النَّحْرِ وَالذَّبْحِ يَوْمَ النَّحْرِ بِالْمُصَلَّى
name_en: An-Nahr and Adh-Dhabh at the Masjid on the day of Nahr

name_ar: باب كَلاَمِ الإِمَامِ وَالنَّاسِ فِي خُطْبَةِ الْعِيدِ، وَإِذَا سُئِلَ الإِمَامُ عَنْ شَيْءٍ وَهْوَ يَخْطُبُ
name_en: If the Imam is asked about something while he is delivering the Khutba

name_ar: باب مَنْ خَالَفَ الطَّرِيقَ إِذَا رَجَعَ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
name_en: Whoever returned (after offering the Eid prayer) on the day of Eid through a way different from that by which he went

name_ar: باب إِذَا فَاتَهُ الْعِيدُ يُصَلِّي رَكْعَتَيْنِ
name_en: Whoever missed the Eid prayer should offer two Rak'a prayer

name_ar: باب الصَّلاَةِ قَبْلَ الْعِيدِ وَبَعْدَهَا
name_en: Salat before or after the Eid prayer

name_ar: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ
name_en: What is said regarding the Witr prayer

name_ar: باب سَاعَاتِ الْوِتْرِ
name_en: The timing of the Salat-ul-Witr (Witr prayer)

name_ar: باب إِيقَاظِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم أَهْلَهُ بِالْوِتْرِ
name_en: The Prophet (ﷺ) used to wake his family up for the Witr prayer

name_ar: باب لِيَجْعَلْ آخِرَ صَلاَتِهِ وِتْرًا
name_en: Witr as the last Salat (at night)

name_ar: باب الْوِتْرِ عَلَى الدَّابَّةِ
name_en: To offer the Witr Salat while riding on an animal

name_ar: باب الْوِتْرِ فِي السَّفَرِ
name_en: Offering prayers of Witr while on a journey

name_ar: باب الْقُنُوتِ قَبْلَ الرُّكُوعِ وَبَعْدَهُ
name_en: To recite Qunut before and after bowing

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ وَخُرُوجِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
name_en: Going out of the Prophet (ﷺ) to offer Istisqa' prayer

name_ar: باب دُعَاءِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏ اجْعَلْهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سِنِينَ كَسِنِي يُوسُفَ ‏"‏
name_en: Invocation of the Prophet (ﷺ)

name_ar: باب سُؤَالِ النَّاسِ الإِمَامَ الاِسْتِسْقَاءَ إِذَا قَحَطُوا
name_en: Request of the people to the Imam to offer the Istisqa' prayer

name_ar: باب تَحْوِيلِ الرِّدَاءِ فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
name_en: Turning cloak inside out while offering the Istisqa' prayer

name_ar: بَابُ انْتِقَامِ الرَّبِّ جَلَّ وَعَزَّ مِنْ خَلْقِهِ بِالْقَحْطِ إِذَا انْتُهِكَ مَحَارِمُ اللَّهِ
name_en: The taking of revenge by Allah over His creatures by drought

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْجَامِعِ
name_en: Istisqa' in the main mosque (of the town)

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ فِي خُطْبَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ غَيْرَ مُسْتَقْبِلِ الْقِبْلَةِ
name_en: To invoke Allah for rain in the Khutba of Friday facing a direction other than the Qiblah

name_ar: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ
name_en: Istisqa' (to invoke Allah for the rain) on the pulpit

name_ar: باب مَنِ اكْتَفَى بِصَلاَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
name_en: Whoever To invoke Allah for rain in the Jumu'ah prayer

name_ar: باب الدُّعَاءِ إِذَا تَقَطَّعَتِ السُّبُلُ مِنْ كَثْرَةِ الْمَطَرِ
name_en: Invocation (for stoppage of rain)

name_ar: بَابُ مَا قِيلَ إِنَّ النَّبِيَّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ لَمْ يُحَوِّلْ رِدَاءَهُ فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
name_en: The saying that "The Prophet (ﷺ) did not turn his cloak inside out during the invocation for rain on Friday."

name_ar: باب إِذَا اسْتَشْفَعُوا إِلَى الإِمَامِ لِيَسْتَسْقِيَ لَهُمْ لَمْ يَرُدُّهُمْ
name_en: If the people request the Imam to invoke Allah for rain, the Imam should not refuse

name_ar: باب إِذَا اسْتَشْفَعَ الْمُشْرِكُونَ بِالْمُسْلِمِينَ عِنْدَ الْقَحْطِ
name_en: If Al-Mushrikun intercede the Muslim to invoke Allah for rain during drought

name_ar: باب الدُّعَاءِ إِذَا كَثُرَ الْمَطَرُ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلاَ عَلَيْنَا
name_en: To say, "Around us and not on us." when it rains excessively

name_ar: باب الدُّعَاءِ فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ قَائِمًا
name_en: To invoke Allah for rain while standing
